transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Haan sir.
Customer: Main keh raha hun, kaun se product ki, kis product mein aapko bulk leads chahiye, sir woh bataiye. Kyunki jaise ki koi machine hoga, machine toh shayad machine ki lead toh bulk mein nahi aa payegi. Kyun?
Customer: Aur agar koi machine 5-6 lakh rupaye ka hai toh koi ek hi machine mangayega na? 50-60 machine ya 100 machine ka order toh nahi dega, I think. Mere paas 5-6 lakh ka machine nahi hai sir.
Executive: Aapka kyun? Kaun sa machine hai? Aapka toh air tower AC hai. Aapka jo backend ka AC hai, backend wala, woh aapka ₹1.5 lakh ka hai, ₹1,76,000 ka.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan na? Toh aap bataiye kaun se machine ki aapko requirement aa rahi hai? Iski toh aapko Corporate Corporate level ka kaam chahiye sir. Yeh gharelu kaam nahi chahiye.
Customer: Kaun sa chahiye? Corporate level ka. Commercial. Haan.
Executive: Kis cheez ka? Yeh air conditioner mein?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achha, matlab ki corporate jo companies apne liye mangati hai, woh mangaye aap chahte hain?
Customer: Haan, woh chahiye mujhe. Un logon ka, un logon se kaam chahiye.
Executive: Achha, single party na mangaye? Single party nahi mangaye, hai na? Kyunki gharelu log toh zyada mangate hain, ghar ke liye. Gharelu wala kaun itna kharcha karega 5-10 lakh?
Customer: Nahi, main puchh raha hun. Aas paas toh phir aas paas deal karte honge na? Yeh toh single side hai aapke.
Executive: Haan?
Customer: Aas paas toh aap single deal kar sakte ho na yeh saari cheezein? Nahi karta toh main karta hi nahi.
Executive: Pune mein bhi nahi karoge aas paas single piece, do piece wagera?
Customer: Nahi karunga.
Executive: Achha achha. Mere ko lot mein chahiye, lot mein.
Customer: Lot mein chahiye. Aur lot ka minimum order lot mein nahi, lot, lot mein chahiye, lot ka.
Executive: Lot. L.O.T.
Customer: Okay okay, got it sir. Aur minimum order quantity kya hogi sir aapki lot mein, aap mujhe bataiye?
Customer: 50, 25 lakh rupaye hai na? ₹25 lakh tak.
Executive: Haan?
Customer: Nahi nahi. Hello. Machine ka baat kar raha hun.
Executive: Achha, 25 piece matlab 25 piece agar karunga toh ₹1 lakh ka toh woh ₹25-30 lakh ka hi ho jayega woh.
Customer: 20 aisa piece milega toh uske peeche profit milega na? Ek do machine ke peeche kya profit milega?
Executive: Nahi, ek do machine mein toh waise bhi nahi aayega sir aapko hai na?
Customer: Ek do machine mein toh niklega bhi nahi aapka hai na? Toh ek second mein dekh leta hun sir. Main aapko Aapko hi samajh mein aana chahiye na?
Executive: Nahi, mere ko toh sir samajh mein, tabhi toh main aapse puchh raha hun. Tabhi main samajh ke hi aapse saari cheezein kar raha hun. Tabhi maine aapka catalog khola hua hai. Hai na? Jaise ki Mere ko yeh commercial, commercial jo rehta hai na IT company. Hmm. Udhar se kaam chahiye.
Executive: Haan matlab companies mangaye, wohi jitne bhi setup kar rahe hote hain, companies kar rahe hote hain ya phir jitne bhi naye builder hote hain jo corporate office bana rahe hote hain, woh sab aapse connect karenge na? Haan, wohi chahiye.
Customer: Haan haan. Yeh wali cheezein chahiye aapko. Kyunki corporate office builder banate hain, wohi apna AC jise usme requirement hoti hai. Jaise koi aap society bana rahe hain. Are ek ek aadha builder kya karta hai, karta hai uski jab society banti hai, uske flat. Haan wohi.
Customer: Turant jald se jald jaane ke liye kya karta hai woh? Har ek customer ko AC free deta hai. AC free nahi deta. Woh uska sab usme add rehta hai. Setup karke deta hai sab flat laga ke deta hai. Setup karke deta hai. Haan. Woh dekho, agar ek katta, ek building mein agar 50, 50 flat rahenge, 25 flat rahenge, usme kaam aata hai toh main kar sakta hun. Aisa bol raha hun. Nahi, samajh gaya main aapki requirement. Abhi tak thodi si dikkat aa rahi thi samajhne mein but ab proper aa gaya. Jaise ki aapko wohi chahiye. Ek toh yeh chahiye ki woh builder apne flats mein laga ke deta hai aur jaise woh apna bhi jab tak woh flat nahi ban jaate hain tab tak woh corporate office kholta hai toh wahan par bhi 8-10 AC laga ke rakhta hai apne apne apne woh hota hai na usme bhi laga ke rakhta hai. Flat flat rehta hai uska sales office rehta hai. Usme bhi laga ke rakhta hai. Woh jo use karta hai woh woh yeh bhi karke deta hai hum log. Haan, woh bhi woh bhi deta hai na? Sales office mein bhi lagta hai uske toh waise requirement hai. Ek toh yeh builder ki ho gayi. Iske alawa sir? Iske alawa jo apna IT company mein jo centralized AC rehta hai. Haan, woh duct wale ya duct wale. Haan, duct wale woh sab sab sab kaam karte hain hum log. Theek hai, air duct ho gaya aur mall mein bhi ho gaya. Mall ka bhi agar requirement hai. Aapke office mein hai kya AC? Hamare mein toh lag rakha hai na sir, air duct lag rakha hai pehle se hi lekin. Haan, phir woh usko kya bolte hain na woh zara ek baar puchho aap. Air duct hi kehte hain isko, air duct hi toh kehte hain isko. Woh centralized AC ho gaya, centralized. Haan, centralized, centralized matlab woh duct wala bahar ja raha hota hai. Centralized hi karta hun main. Haan, woh centralized hi hota hai. Centralized hi karte hain aap log na? Mere office mein centralized. Haan. Centralized AC. Toh yeh kisi company ka contract chahiye jo society building bana rahe hain, woh company ka chahiye na? Ya society centralized AC. Aapka A A A aur AC ka woh ho gaya, centralized ho gaya aur aapka tower AC ho gaya, Deccan VRF ho gaya. Yeh pressurize, yeh pressurization system kya hua sir? Pressurization system ka kya hai sir? Pressurization system ka aisa hai jab commercial aur corporate mein jo staircase rehta hai. Haan haan haan. Toh staircase mein jab aag lagti hai. Okay. Jab dhua jama hota hai, floor pe agar aag lagti hai toh log kahan se bhagte hain? Fire exit se bhagenge. Fire exit se bhagenge. Fire exit se bhagenge. Haan, toh udhar pressure jo dete hain na hum usko staircase pressurization bolte hain. Okay okay, got it. Matlab uska saara cheez yeh hota hai. Toh yeh main iska bhi set kar deta hun. Yeh bhi laga diya aapka. Staircase pressurization. Basement ventilation. Jo parking mein, neeche basement mein jo gaadiyan park hoti hai. Hmm. Udhar bhi karte hain kaam hum ventilation ka. Kis mein? Yeh ho gaya, yeh ho gaya, theek hai. Theek hai, samajh ko na? Yeh abhi se correct ho jayega. Aap mujhe matlab ek hafta, 10 din, matlab ek hafte mein aap dekhiyega aapka jo leads hai na woh slow ho jayega. Bas ek cheez kariye ga jo aapke nahi kaam ki hogi na jo ek piece ki hogi hogi, usko not relevant zaroor mark kar dijiyega apni taraf se. Taaki woh feeder mere paas aa jaye. Kar lenge na sir yeh? Kya kya? Pata hai na aapko idea hai kya sir? Ek baar main bata deta hun, leads khol lijiye ek baar aap apni. Leads ek baar kholiye. Toh ek minute. Lead kholiye. Isme na koi bhi lead dekho jo aapke kaam ki na ho, ek piece ki ho jo bhi hai, ek ek piece ki aa rakhi ho jo aapke kaam ki na ho, ek piece ki ho. Haan. Usko Toh dekhiye side mein dustbin hoga, ek delete karne ka button hoga, not relevant hoga toh. Kahan se milega? Kahan pe hai? Aap app mein dekh rahe ho ya system pe dekh rahe ho? App mein dekh raha hun. App mein nahi dekhiye. By lead jahan likhi hoti hai information, uske bagal mein chhota sa ek delete ka button bana hota hai, dustbin type ka bana hota hai. Bana hai delete ka button? Nahi hai sir. Bana hota hai sir. Upar se ek baar filter ko location ko all India kar lijiye ek baar. Taaki woh recommended pe hoga toh nahi dikh raha hoga aapko. Haan, all India hi hai. All India sab toh dikhao chahiye. Chhota sa dustbin aata hai. Dekho aage neeche kisi lead pe aa raha hoga, chhota sa dustbin aa raha hoga. Sir, location hai, catalog hai, fresh hai, unread hai, more hai. Nahi, by leads pe jao pehle, by leads pe jao. Okay. By leads pe okay. Haan. By leads pe gaye toh dekhiye jahan by leads ki information hoti hai ki yeh requirement hai buyer ki, uske bagal mein ek chhota sa delete ka option hoga. Barabar, haan. Uspe click karenge toh aa jayega ki main is lead mein deal nahi karna chahta, reason kya hai? Toh aap kar sakte hain ki retail quantity hai, ek piece mein main deal nahi kar raha, usko karke submit kar doge toh leads aana band ho jayega aapko. Dheere dheere karke aap submit ek hafte tak ya 10 din tak feedback doge toh hamari taraf se yeh aana band ho jayega aur jo aap kaam ka hai consume karoge waisa leads aapki taraf badh jayega sir. Chaliye okay, thank you sir. Toh yahi karna hai bas, hai na? Okay okay. Theek hai? Toh ab is call ka feedback aayega toh please usse yes de dijiyega sir, hai na? Theek hai. Theek hai? Thank you sir, thank you. Ab yeh ho jayega isko follow karna bas 10 se 15 din mein feedback lunga sir. Theek hai, chalega.
Okay, theek hai. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants corporate-level work, not household work.

- Needs leads in lots, not single pieces.

- Wants leads for IT companies.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to mark leads irrelevant.

- Executive confirmed the customer's requirements.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will follow up in 10-15 days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, requirements, lot, corporate, irrelevant
